page.title: 15Medical Services.
page.content: If you are ill you telephone the Doctor for an appointment. You go to the Doctor's Surgery. When you have seen him he wll give you a prescription. You take it to the Chemist where you buy the medicine. If you are too ill to visit the surgery the Doctor will come to your home. Every 6 months you should visit the Dentist to have your teeth checked. There are 5 Dental Surgeries in this area. If you have trouble with your feet you can go to the Chiropodist. The School Nurse and Doctor come to school to keep a check on you also. They check your hair regularly , look at your nails and then give you an eye test and a hearing test. There is also an Opticians in Heald Green where you can have eye tests and buy glasses.
